formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AGI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: VERBOSE <message> <level> Sends <message> to the console via verbose message system. <level> is the the verbose level (1-4) Always returns 1.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -2,3 +2,4 @@ Sends <message> to the console via verbose message system. <level> is the the verbose level (1-4) Always returns 1. + Runs Dead : Yes
